title: To The Office Of Dr. Tau, Paratherapist
content:
[[module CSS]]
.info-container{
--barColour: #263571;
--linkColour: #fff;
}
.info-container .collapsible-block-content > div:nth-child(1) > p {
    margin: 0.5em;
}
.info-container #u-author_block, .info-container .translation_block{
 display: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --timeScale: 1.5;
    --timeDelay: 0.5s;
}
[[/module]]
[[module CSS]]
@import url(''https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans+Condensed:wght@300&display=swap'');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Condensed:wght@300&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Teko:wght@300&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=EB+Garamond&display=swap');
.Salamin {
  font-family: 'EB Garamond', serif;
  font-size: 1.00em;
  font-style: italic;
}
:root {
    --pale-accent: 158, 105, 0;
    --bright-accent: 232, 202, 37;
    --medium-accent: 55, 158, 179;
    --dark-accent: 38, 53, 113;
    --alt-accent: 255, 126, 5;
--header-h2-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.05);
--header-gradient-color-bottom: var(--medium-accent);
--header-gradient-color-middle: var(--dark-accent);
--visited-link-color: var(--pale-accent);
--hover-link-color: var(--bright-accent);
--tabs-bg: var(--dark-accent);
--rating-module-bottom-border-color: var(--dark-accent);
--rating-module-button-plus-color: 55, 158, 179;
--rating-module-button-negative-color: 255, 126, 5;
--title-font: 'Barlow Condensed', sans-serif;
--header-font: 'Teko', sans-serif;
--logo-image: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/rtsandboxnoketerleftbehind/scp-reintegration-sigil-alt.png);
--header-title: "Site-48 Reintegration Committee";
--header-subtitle: "Safety, Camaraderie, Prosperity";
}
[[/module]]
[[module CSS]]
.appeal{
    border:dotted 1px #000000;
    background:#F8F8FF;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
    max-width: 500px;
}
.intranet{
    border:dotted 1px #000000;
    background:#555555;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
    color: #dcdcdc;
}
.transcript{
    border:dotted 1px #000000;
    background:#f2f3f4;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}
.eur{
    border:dotted 1px #000000;
    background:#f5fffa;
    width:90%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}
.memo{
    border:dotted 1px #000000;
    background:#f2f3f4;
    width:70%;
    padding:1px 15px;
    margin: 10px auto;
}
.Tau {
  font-family: 'Segoe Script';
  font-style: italic;
}
.Brahim {
  font-family: 'Segoe Print';
  font-style: italic;
}
.Enjoy {
font-family: 'Bahnschrift';
color:  #333399;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.email-example .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link {
    animation: blink 0.8s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}
@keyframes blink {
    0% { color: transparent; }
    50%, 100% { color: #b01; }
}
.email {border: solid 2px #6e6c67; width: 88%; background: #fff0f5; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1)}
.emailk {border: solid 2px #6e6c67; width: 88%; background: #f0ffff; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-family: "Courier New", "Courier", monospace;
    font-style: normal;
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(202, 219, 228) 0%, rgb(231, 233, 220) 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;
    border: 1px solid #CCC;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 10px 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)
}
.page p,
.page ul {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en
|page=Page#
|authorPage=#u-author_block
|comments=
**Author:** [[*user Dr Phil McClaw]], an actual crustacean [[*user Monsoon Season]], a future crustacean
⚠️ **Content warning:** This article contains a content warning: Chronic illness, Violence/Body Horror, Implied Sexual Assault, Self-harm, Suicide
**Spoilers (hover to show):**
Chronic illness: [[span class="dblock"]] Most characters including Dr. Tau have anomalies analogous to chronic illness. Karina Qamar is given a terminal diagnosis.[[/span]].
Violence/Body Horror: [[span class="dblock"]] Dr. Tau and Loyiso are unable to be perceived due to an aura of blinding light. Krzysztof is genetically disfigured and extremely distressed by his appearance and the discomfort created. Krzysztof is accused of being a cannibal. Karina Qamar spontaneously combusts[[/span]].
Implied Sexual Assault: [[span class="dblock"]]SA is explicit in SCP-3288, and implicitly Krzysztof is descended from SCP-3288 due to one these assaults. Krzysztof is also passively accused of participating in these acts, but his age at time of containment means this is unreasonable.[[/span]].
Self-harm: [[span class="dblock"]] Krzysztof's story explicitly describes self-harming behavior such as using fingernails to break skin[[/span]].
Suicide: [[span class="dblock"]] Krzysztof implicitly has attempted suicide[[/span]].
]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="appeal"]]
[[div style="background: url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/byebyemanparatherapy/scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-page.png') bottom center no-repeat; background-size: 70%; background-position: center center; text-align: left; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 16px; padding: 0px;"]]]]
-----
[[=]]
+ E-39286 | __Prescription of Paratherapy__, 20/08/2026
[[/=]]
-----
[[=]]
+ __**STATUS:__ ##green|ACTIVE##**
[[/=]]
-----
+++ __**Description:**__
* E-39286 ("Loyiso Winde") presented to Site-IJ8 personnel 12/08/26 displaying symptoms of stage 3 Dermicandia[[footnote]] A condition caused by dermal infection of the fungus //Sporothrix rhodesii//. Symptoms include chills and painful subcutaneous lesions which produce bioluminescence up to 6,000 Lumens in intensity. In 50% of infections, illness progresses to life-threatening fungemia (fungal presence in blood). [[/footnote]];
* E-39286 has received preliminary regiment of anti-fungal and immune-boosting medication as well as high-tint photochromic contact lenses;
* E-39286 has displayed exceptional resistance to further progression through stages of infection
+++ __**Recommended Paratherapeutic Procedures:**__
* Ocular examination and prescription lenses; **##green|Approved##**
* Genome sequencing; **##green|Approved##**
* Genetic therapy; **##orange|Conditional- Further progression of symptoms##**
* Continued immune system supplements; **##green|Administered##**
* Antifungal drug Mycorenal; **##gray|Pending Acquisition##**
* Full-body garment made to Site-48 specifications; **##gray|In transit##**
E-39286 is to be **##gray|QUARANTINED##** at Site-IJ8 in a humanoid biohazard containment unit and **##gray|TRANSFERRED##** to Site-48 Anthropoid Wing I pending completion of current prescription. Subject is to be provided up to two portions of every meal to combat calories lost through production of bioluminescence.
@@           @@
@@           @@
@@           @@
@@           @@
-----
//If you believe an error has been made in this assessment, or if you have any further inquiries, please direct all subsequent correspondence to your assigned Therapist.//
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="appeal"]]
[[div style="background: url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/byebyemanparatherapy/scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-page-reverse.png') bottom center no-repeat; background-size: 70%; background-position: center center; text-align: left; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 16px; padding: 0px;"]]]
-----
[[=]]
+ E-39286 | __Prescription of Paratherapy__, 20/08/2026
[[/=]]
-----
[[=]]
+ __**SUBJECT:__ ##gray|LOYISO WINDE##**
[[/=]]
-----
+++ __**Patient Information:**__
* **DOB: 05/11/2010**@@              @@**SEX: M**@@              @@**NAT: South African**
* **HEIGHT: 164cm**@@               @@**WEIGHT: 50kg**
* **STATUS: ##orange|Urgent##**
* **PRIOR CONDITIONS: None**
+++ __**Acquisition:**__
* E-39286 entered Foundation custody following routine observation of hospitals in Southern Africa for infections by //Sporotrichosis Rhodesii//. E-39286 was sent to containment at Site-IJ8 for medical intervention. E-39286 entered jurisdiction of Reintegration Committee Paratherapy Division by request.
+++ __**Therapist Notes:**__
**[[span class="Tau"]]Site-IJ8 personnel are encouraged to defer to the recommendations of Site-48 Paratherapy Head before administering further treatments per my prior experience with pathogen.[[/span]]**
@@           @@
@@           @@
@@           @@
@@           @@
+ **__x [[span class="Tau"]]Thandiwe Tau[[/span]]__**
-----
//If you believe an error has been made in this assessment, or if you have any further inquiries, please direct all subsequent correspondence to your assigned Therapist.//
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[div class="intranet"]]
@@           @@
[[image scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-pfp.png]] @@                 @@**##darkgrey|###**@@    @@**##darkgrey|Transcript-SIJ8-20-08-2026-1##**
-----
[[image scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-pfp.png]] [**10:58 CET** Scipnet uplink between **Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau** and **Site-IJ8 Unit #208**]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^10:59 AM^^
@@           @@//Invite accepted.//
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^10:59 AM^^
@@           @@//Video call commenced.//
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Loyiso immediately disables his video stream. Dr. Tau broadcasts her augmented reality avatar, an anthropoid with a streetlamp in place of a human head. Her office is oddly dim.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^10:59 AM^^
@@           @@Hello, Loyiso! I'm Dr. Tau. It's alright; put your feed back on. At least let me hear you.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@Um, hello doctor.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Dr. Tau cycles through various other avatar filters until it is disabled. She is dressed in a navy blue full-body shroud.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@Oops, that was me. There we go. Hello, Loyiso.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@Hi.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@So, you're doing well, like they say? Your readings are strong. How do you feel?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@I could be worse. Don't want to sit up.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@Yeah, I get that. The headaches go away when your eyes adjust. A few weeks. But for now, you've gone over the prescription? You don't have questions?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:00 AM^^
@@           @@None.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Silence.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Sorry, it's very hard for me to talk to an empty screen. I promise I do not bite.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Loyiso turns on his tablet computer's camera. The video is washed out by the bright glow emanated by Loyiso.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@See, I can't even see your face! Don't worry, I get it.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Dr. Tau removes her glove, flooding her own screen with a shimmer of light.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@We're about the same. Cover up the shine for now.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Both participants obscur their glows from the camera. Dr. Tau can see that the ailment has not spread above E-39286's shoulders.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@That's good, it's not nearly as far gone as mine.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@ You're going through this too?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Went through it. Now I'm on the other side. And so, too, you will be. You're looking remarkable so far. Were you gardening? I was gardening.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Hiking.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Oof, that'll do it, alright. You're doing well, Loyiso.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Like this is supposed to be normal.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:01 AM^^
@@           @@Yeah, I guess you and I have a //different// type of normal than most people.  
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Dr. Tau returns her filter to her lamp-headed avatar.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@You can set your own filter, too, in the tab.  
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@ Okay.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Loyiso plays with the filters, projecting various avatars with mechanical, vulpine, and feline characteristics; he settles on an avatar of a stereotypical 'gray' extraterrestrial, amusing Dr. Tau.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@Hah. This program, **##orchid|Rosetta.aic##**, is also transcribing everything we're saying, so you can read this back if you need clarity.  
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@ Woah, you really mean //everything//. Even tone.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@Yep, **##orchid|Rosetta##** is wonderful. She can translate on your behalf, in real time.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##c9c0bb|IJ8#208##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@[Sotho] Yeah? What's she know about African languages?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:02 AM^^
@@           @@[Xhosa] She knows a good amount.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [A participant's designation has been modified.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##9fa91f|Office of Dr. Loyiso Winde##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Ooh, I can change that, too.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Yes, you can. You're going to be doctor, Loyiso?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##9fa91f|Office of Dr. Loyiso Winde##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Uhm, maybe. I want a job that takes me on the ocean.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Yes, Captain Loyiso. Or you can be the lighthouse.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Loyiso and Dr. Tau share a laugh. A participant's designation has been modified.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Well, if you keep up on the prescription, we can get you on a boat to Europe.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##9fa91f|Captain Loyiso Winde##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@What, //really//? Why?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Treatment, some research. I've done the paperwork for you; you just need to finish your current prescription, that's all.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##9fa91f|Captain Loyiso Winde##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@Wow, that's... What about my dad?
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:03 AM^^
@@           @@I've called your dad, and he's happy to have you sent there. It is an option. You can stay in the home country and I'll still keep in touch. You know about the travel restrictions, you might not see your dad for some time, even after your quarantine. Give it some thought.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-foundation-pfp-trans.png]] **##9fa91f|Captain Loyiso Winde##** ^^11:04 AM^^
@@           @@Nah. If he's okay with it, I wanna go.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:04 AM^^
@@           @@Then look forward to that, //Captain//. I'll keep in touch.
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-tau-pfp.png]] **##orchid|Office of Dr. Thandiwe Tau##** ^^11:04 AM^^
@@           @@//Video call ended.//
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-rosetta-pfp.png]] [Transcribed and translated from Afrikaans by ##orchid|**Rosetta.aic**##.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[image scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-pfp.png]] [**11:04 CET** Scipnet uplink disconnected.]
@@           @@
@@           @@
[[/div]]
[[div class="appeal"]]
[[div style="background: url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/byebyemanparatherapy/scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-page.png') bottom center no-repeat; background-size: 70%; background-position: center center; text-align: left; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 16px; padding: 0px;"]]]]
-----
[[div style="float: left"]]
[[image scp-site-48-sigil-xsmall.png]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
+ E-39286 | Loyiso Winde
-----
+ **[[span class="Enjoy"]]Welcome to Site-48A![[/span]]**
[[/=]]
+++ @@              @@ **[[span class="Enjoy"]]You'll be Staying in...[[/span]]**
[[div style="float:left"]]
[[image scp-loyiso-room.png]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
+++ **[[span class="Enjoy"]]Section:[[/span]]**
[[=]]

[[/=]]

@@ @@
+++ **[[span class="Enjoy"]]Unit #:[[/span]]**
[[=]]
++ **[[span class="Enjoy"]]1404,  L2[[/span]]**
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
**Daily Schedule: 07:00** Wake-Up Call, Commissary, Breakfast; **08:00** End of Breakfast;
**09:00** (See Counselor for Instruction Opportunities);
**13:00** Lunch; **14:00** End of Lunch; **18:00** End of Instruction Period, Supper;
**19:00** End of Supper;  **23:00** Lights Out
-----
//Seek guidance from your Counselor/Containment Specialist// (__**##orchid|[[span class="Tau"]]Thandiwe Tau[[/span]]##**__)
//if you have questions or take issue with your designated arrangements.//
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
-----
[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:80%;"]]
[[image scp-dr-tau.png style="width:80%;"]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width:80%;"]]
Dr. Tau tending to an infant in her care
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
-----
@@           @@
[[div class="appeal"]]
[[div style="background: url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/byebyemanparatherapy/scp-reintegration-sigil-trans-page.png') bottom center no-repeat; background-size: 70%; background-position: center center; text-align: left; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 16px; padding: 0px;"]]]]
-----
[[=]]
+ SCP-3288-18762 | __Prescription of Paratherapy__, 04/02/2022
[[/=]]
-----
[[=]]
+ __**STATUS:__ ##green|ACTIVE##**
[[/=]]
-----
+++ __**Description:**__
* SCP-3288-18762 ("Krzysztof Olejniczak") is a danger to himself;
* SCP-3288-18762's genetic relation to //homo anthropophagus// has been determined to be substantial[[footnote]] up to 1/16th by descent. [[/footnote]];
* SCP-3288-18762 is hindered by the following ailments of anomalous origin:
 * Hyperdontia[[footnote]] Supernumerary teeth in addition to baseline teeth. [[/footnote]];
 * Mandibular Prognathism[[footnote]] A genetic disorder resulting in the extension of lower jaw and a pronounced crossbite. [[/footnote]];
 * Dolichostenomelia[[footnote]] A condition resulting in limbs of abnormal length. [[/footnote]];
 * Arachnodactyly[[footnote]] A condition resulting in digits of abnormal length. [[/footnote]];
 * Gottschall-Gärtner Syndrome[[footnote]] A condition resulting in the development of a layer of enamel on the epidermis.[[/footnote]];
 * Acute Photophobia[[footnote]] Sensitivity to light.[[/footnote]];
 * Major Depressive Disorder
* SCP-3288-18762 is uncooperative, but does **NOT** display malicious behavior typical of **[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3288 |SCP-3288]]]**
+++ __**Recommended Paratherapeutic Procedures:**__
* Genetic recalibration therapy; **##orange|Conditional- Reintegration##**
* Thyroid hormone replacement; **##orange|Conditional- Reintegration##**
* Skin grafts; **##green|Approved##**
* Extensive dental care; **##orange|Conditional- Reintegration##**
* Psychotherapy; **##green|Approved- Three times weekly##**
* Photochromic lenses; **##gray|In transit##**
* Allocated recreation time;  **##orange|Conditional- Evaluation##**
SCP-3288-18762 is to be **##gray|TRANSFERRED##** to Site-48 Anthropoid Wing E and placed on **##gray|PSYCHIATRIC WATCH##**. SCP-3288-18762 is to undergo a twice weekly physical examination by Dr. Moncef Brahim.
-----

+++ __**Acquisition:**__
* SCP-3288-18762 entered Foundation containment at age 11 after typical SCP-3288 characteristics were identified on him and his mother (SCP-3288-5238). SCP-3288-18762 and -5238, who is 12.5% //homo anthropophagus// by descent, were born at an undiscovered compound in Poland but were exiled for undisclosed reasons. Instances were contained at Humanoid Containment Site-282. After site personnel concluded he could not provide information to contain further instances, SCP-3288-18762 received an order of Termination 19/11/2019. SCP-3288-18762 was granted a stay of Termination after submitting an appeal vouched by one member of Site personnel; after O5 deliberation, SCP-3288-18762 has entered the jurisdiction of the Reintegration Committee Paratherapy Division due to his outstanding circumstances.

+++ __**Determination:**__
* SCP-3288-18762 ("Krzysztof Olejniczak") is a Keter-class anomaly;
* SCP-3288-18762 is capable of reproduction;
* SCP-3288-18762 may be linked to uncontained instances of SCP-3288;
* SCP-3288-18762 is recorded to be uncooperative with Reintegration procedures and unresponsive to authority;
* SCP-3288-18762 scored inadequately on Reintegration Aptitude Test;
* SCP-3288-18762 has shown a distrustful temperament towards Foundation protocol, personnel, and mission;
* SCP-3288-18762 has not shown interest in developing professional skills or entering the labor force
+++ __**Recommendation:**__
The Committee determines that SCP-3288-18762 is unqualified for the Reintegration Protocol. Reintegration of SCP-3288-18762 would violate special containment procedures of a Keter-class anomaly. Recommend containment at Site-48 Anthropoid Wing G. SCP-3288-18762 is authorized to visit Internal Education units in Anthropoid Wing B and Recreation units. Redouble psychiatric watch for the next two weeks.

++++ **Call from Eurtec Civil Authority Precinct #095 10:07 CET 02/12/22**

= **{{[__Begin Transcript.__]}}**

**Tau:** Hello, Dr. Tau speaking.

**Duvall:** And just why the hell did it take you this long to pick up? I know you don't leave that office.

**Tau:** //Excuse you//. I didn't have to pick up at all.

**Duvall:** I apologize, doctor. I only have four minutes, can you please hear what I have to say?

**Tau:** I got the notification. Have you pleaded yet?

**Duvall:** I'm not guilty. This is asinine!

**Tau:** The woman got mesothelioma, Bill. You even put asbestos in the //bedsheets//.

**Duvall:** And she was fine! She's not human! You told me she had, like, robot lungs! And they got better healthcare than //my// insurance. Ask yourself, //did her house burn down?// No!

**Tau:** You're being obtuse on purpose. Avoiding blame.

**Duvall:** You're in this, too, Dr. Tau. This is your division.

**Tau:** Yes, and //thank you so much// for that, Bill! I'm on this end getting //ass-fucked// by the Council for you!

**Duvall:** And where is the council for me, huh? Why am I stuck in here?

**Tau:** You know how the extradition treaties work, Bill. Believe me, both the Councillors and I would //really// prefer to have you //here// to answer to us instead of at the //fucking// circus over there!

**Duvall:** So I have to foot the bill for my lawyers, too, I'm guessing.

**Tau:** Yeah, so do I, Bill!

**Duvall:** They just want money. The girl and the judge. It's all about money. They're gonna tear down my business and for what? Some drone?

**Tau:** Even //if// Eurtec allows you to walk, //you're// going to be some drone at this rate. Except less useful.

**Duvall:** Uh, did the Council actually say that?

**Tau:** No, I don't think so. I'm just pissed off at you.

[Pause.]

**Tau:** Okay, I can tell them it's in everyone's interest that you have a lawyer. You're //not// getting extradited until Hyperkine sees that money, I can tell you that.

**Duvall:** Always squeezing the middle class, these tech bastards.

**Tau:** Okay. I don't know how to make the Council throw money at this problem. But if the property charges are dropped, you'll just serve community service for the attempted murder.

**Duvall:** Makes sense. I must ask just more one thing of you.

**Tau:** Yes?

**Duvall:** Can you send the word out. I don't want to lose my job. My livelihood. Over //this//.

**Tau:** Yeah, sure.

**Duvall:** They'll let that bastard Helman take it. Don't let them.

**Tau:**  Okay. Goodbye, Mr. Duvall.

**Duvall:** Bastard would tear the place down. Please do—

[Call disconnects.]
= **{{[__End Transcript.__]}}**
